abstract: Michael Douglas will play Liberace, and Matt Damon will play Scott Thorson, his live-in lover, in a biographical film, "Behind the Candelabra," which Steven Soderbergh will direct.
snippet: Michael Douglas will play Liberace, and Matt Damon will play Scott Thorson, his live-in lover, in a biographical film, "Behind the Candelabra," which Steven Soderbergh will direct.
lead_paragraph: You spend enough years in Las Vegas and eventually its kitschy charm leaves an indelible mark on you. Having made three movies about Danny Ocean and his Rat Pack-like team of casino-heist experts, as well as critically acclaimed films like "Traffic," "Erin Brockovich" and "Sex, Lies and Videotape," Steven Soderbergh has turned to the only subject that was left for him: a biographical movie about Liberace.

headline.main: Cue the Kitsch: Soderbergh to Make Liberace Film Starring Douglas and Damon for HBO
